bike.description: Carbon monocoque frame with Nano technology. A super-rigid model, lightweight and aerodynamic, high-performance in every detail: From the Super Aero full-carbon fork weighing 450g to the oversized and perforated chain stays, up to the horizontal rear dropouts. Frame: D2 crono/triathlon carbon - siZe xs - s - m - l - btt01 - xs=680 / s=720 / m=770 / l=820 headseat integrated1,1/8”, (seatpost cod.c7205190).
